title: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get a message saying 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. I don't understand what this message means.
OB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection, a message saying 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant' is displayed.
EB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection, I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars displayed instead of receiving the 'No declaration' message.
SR:
1. Open a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant). 
2. Hit F4 on the project selection.
